name: Santa Monica Sustainable City Data Catalog
description: Data catalog for the City of Santa Monica's Sustainable City Plan, including topics such as resource conservation, environmental/public health, transportation, economic, land use, housing, civic engagement, quality of life, and arts/culture.

data_themes.description: Resource conservation, environmental and public health, open space and land use
Transportation data for moving people and things quickly, safely, and cleanly
Sustainable local economy, nurturing a diverse and equitable economy
Housing, civic participation and community education, quality of life, arts and culture

geotopics.description: Environmental and public health, resource conservation, open space and land use
Resource conservation as related to water
Housing, civic participation, community education, quality of life, arts and culture
Sustainable local economy, economic health and employment
